channel.title: Gaming Entertainment web project
channel.description:
http://gaming-entertainment.com/forum/
This thread will be updated heavily overtime (it's late atm, might finish in morning).
Here's some media to hold off before I add more information shortly, domain hasn't been bought yet nor an official one decided yet until tomorrow.
Some notable features that may interest you, more coming soon:
[ul][*]YouTube video submissions (upload your clips to a page where other users submit videos and get your channel more feedback) [*]Graphics Designing section [*]Computer programming section (includes RSPS in a single category though, RSPS wasn't the main target of this community) [*]Live stream submissions (upload your twitch channel to a page where other users can watch you straight off of Gaming Entertainment) [*]Site Dumps (netflix logins, cracked applications, etc..) [*]18+ section (well, yeah.)[/ul]
The main concept of the community is for YouTube broadcasters, Twitch Streamers, Sports fans (those who watch online), several more concepts of users to be happy to stay in 1 community rather than serach around the internet for a community for what they want separately. Finding PPV's for sport events can be very tedious and annoying based on 80% of sites want you to do a survey, etc.. This simplifies that completely.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/kOL0jjB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TwLXUzK.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QN4onLk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/v5ZUKsM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BOcvt4x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5pSE1zE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vQbWaMV.png[/img]

item.title: Gaming Entertainment web project
item.dc:creator: @TheeRSWiki TheeRSWiki
item.description:
@TheeRSWiki wrote:

http://gaming-entertainment.com/forum/

This thread will be updated heavily overtime (it’s late atm, might finish in morning).

Here’s some media to hold off before I add more information shortly, domain hasn’t been bought yet nor an official one decided yet until tomorrow.

Some notable features that may interest you, more coming soon:

[ul][]YouTube video submissions (upload your clips to a page where other users submit videos and get your channel more feedback)
[]Graphics Designing section
[]Computer programming section (includes RSPS in a single category though, RSPS wasn’t the main target of this community)
[]Live stream submissions (upload your twitch channel to a page where other users can watch you straight off of Gaming Entertainment)
[]Site Dumps (netflix logins, cracked applications, etc…)
[]18+ section (well, yeah.)[/ul]

The main concept of the community is for YouTube broadcasters, Twitch Streamers, Sports fans (those who watch online), several more concepts of users to be happy to stay in 1 community rather than serach around the internet for a community for what they want separately.
Finding PPV’s for sport events can be very tedious and annoying based on 80% of sites want you to do a survey, etc… This simplifies that completely.
